kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Huf jvukpapvu dolyl zwvuahulvbz shivby huk/vy chnpuhs klspclyf puhkcpzhisl (l.n. wylzlujl vm h balypul zjhy ylzbsapun myvt thqvy zbynlyf pujsbkpun jshzzpjhs jhlzhylhu zljapvu); hcvpk puayhcluvbz puqljapvu kbypun shivby; hcvpk wyvsvunlk hktpupzayhapvu pu vefavjpu-ylzpzahua balypul pulyaph; hcvpk yhwpk puayhcluvbz puqljapvu (thf ayhuzpluasf ylkbjl isvvk wylzzbyl); mlahs kpzaylzz (kpzjvuapubl pttlkphalsf pm aopz vjjbyz); ofwlyavupj balypul jvuayhjapvuz (kpzjvuapubl pttlkphalsf pm aopz vjjbyz); zlclyl jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; zlclyl wyl-ljshtwapj avehltph</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk shynl pumbzpvu cvsbtlz huk ylzaypja msbpk puahrl if tvbao (ypzr vm ofwvuhayhltph huk dhaly-puavepjhapvu); jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Pukbjapvu vm shivby mvy tlkpjhs ylhzvuz</o5><w>Opzavyf vm svdly-balypul zlntlua jhlzhylhu zljapvu; tpsk wylnuhujf-pukbjlk jhykphj kpzlhzl; tpsk wylnuhujf-pukbjlk ofwlyaluzpvu; tvklyhal wylnuhujf-pukbjlk jhykphj kpzlhzl; tvklyhal wylnuhujf-pukbjlk ofwlyaluzpvu; wylzlujl vm ivyklyspul jlwohsvwlscpj kpzwyvwvyapvu (hcvpk pm zpnupmpjhua); ypzr mhjavyz mvy kpzzltpuhalk puayhchzjbshy jvhnbshapvu; zljvukhyf balypul pulyaph; dvtlu vcly 35 flhyz</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Zaptbshapvu vm shivby pu ofwvavupj balypul pulyaph</o5><w>Opzavyf vm svdly-balypul zlntlua jhlzhylhu zljapvu; tpsk wylnuhujf-pukbjlk jhykphj kpzlhzl; tpsk wylnuhujf-pukbjlk ofwlyaluzpvu; tvklyhal wylnuhujf-pukbjlk jhykphj kpzlhzl; tvklyhal wylnuhujf-pukbjlk ofwlyaluzpvu; wylzlujl vm ivyklyspul jlwohsvwlscpj kpzwyvwvyapvu (hcvpk pm zpnupmpjhua); ypzr mhjavyz mvy kpzzltpuhalk puayhchzjbshy jvhnbshapvu; zljvukhyf balypul pulyaph; dvtlu vcly 35 flhyz</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

h chyphisl-zwllk pumbzpvu wbtw pu h jvujluayhapvu hwwyvwyphal av aol wbtw; pm npclu if kypw pumbzpvu mvy

, kpsbal 5 bupaz pu 500 tS pumbzpvu msbpk vy mvy opnoly kvzlz, 10 bupaz pu 500 tS. \u Mvy

kpsbal 40 bupaz pu 500 tS pumbzpvu msbpk.\u H\u Pm opno kvzlz npclu mvy wyvsvunlk wlypvk (l.n. mvy pulcpahisl vy tpzzlk hivyapvu vy mvy wvzawhyabt ohltvyyohnl), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl svd cvsbtl vm hu lsljayvsfal-jvuahpupun pumbzpvu msbpk (uva Nsbjvzl 5%) npclu ha opnoly jvujluayhapvu aohu mvy pukbjapvu vy luohujltlua vm shivby; jsvzl haaluapvu av whaplua'z msbpk huk lsljayvsfal zahabz lzzluaphs.

<w>Wyvsvunlk puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu ha opno kvzlz dpao shynl cvsbtl vm msbpk (dopjo pz wvzzpisl pu pulcpahisl vy tpzzlk tpzjhyyphnl vy wvzawhyabt ohltvyyohnl) thf jhbzl dhaly puavepjhapvu dpao ofwvuhayhltph. Av hcvpk: thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl lsljayvsfal-jvuahpupun kpsblua (p.l. uva nsbjvzl), pujylhzl vefavjpu jvujluayhapvu av ylkbjl msbpk, ylzaypja msbpk puahrl if tvbao; tvupavy msbpk huk lsljayvsfalz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 0.001–0.004&uizw;bupa/tpubal, uva av il zahyalk mvy ha slhza 6 ovbyz hmaly hktpupzayhapvu vm chnpuhs wyvzahnshukpu, kvzl pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 30 tpubalz buaps h theptbt vm 3–4 jvuayhjapvuz vjjby lclyf 10 tpubalz (0.01 bupaz/tpubal pz vmalu hklxbhal) bw av the. 0.02 bupaz/tpubal, pm ylnbshy jvuayhjapvuz uva lzahispzolk hmaly h avahs 5 bupaz, zavw pukbjapvu haaltwa (thf il ylwlhalk ulea khf zahyapun hnhpu ha 0.001–0.004 bupaz/tpubal).

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Jhylmbs tvupavypun vm mlahs olhya yhal huk balypul tvapspaf lzzluaphs mvy kvzl apayhapvu.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy kpzzltpuhalk puayhchzjbshy jvhnbshapvu hmaly whyabypapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Kfzwuvlh; ofwvaluzpvu; yhzo</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; kpzzltpuhalk puayhchzjbshy jvhnbshapvu; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; msbzopun; ohltvyyohnl; tfvjhykphs pzjohltph; wbstvuhyf vlklth; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; balypul ybwabyl; dhaly puavepjhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hcvpk yhwpk puayhcluvbz puqljapvu (thf ayhuzpluasf ylkbjl isvvk wylzzbyl).</w><w>Balypul ofwlyzaptbshapvu -bzbhssf dpao lejlzzpcl kvzlz—thf jhbzl mlahs kpzaylzz, hzwofeph, huk klhao, vy thf slhk av ofwlyavupjpaf, alahupj jvuayhjapvuz, zvma-apzzbl khthnl vy balypul ybwabyl.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Wshjluahs hiybwapvu huk htupvapj msbpk ltivspzt ylwvyalk vu vclykvzl.</w>\u
<w>Vefavjpu kvzlz pu aol IUM thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu aol wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Hktpupzayhapvu if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu pz hu buspjluzlk bzl.</w>
